LanguageData.CorruptionSettingsDesc: A set of options to customise your new game. Note that each feature turned off takes away from the experience.
LanguageData.AllowFactionsTip: Enable / disable 40K factions to be spawned into the world.
LanguageData.AllowDominationTip: Enable / disable Domination Mechanics, like Battlezones and Tributes.
LanguageData.AllowPsykersTip: Enable / disable psykers and psychic powers to play a role in gameplay.
